venue.address_2: Corner of State and Pleasant Streets
venue.name: Richdale Food Store

item.description:
The 8th Annual American Red Cross Chocolate Tour!


Let's go to Newburyport and check out the stores that will be serving a selection of chocolate goodies.

We have done this in the past and we had a lot of fun, we will be walking around Newburyport, checking out all the merchandise in the stores, and of course eating chocolate (Yummmy).  Last year there were over 15+ stores/restaurants that give out different versions of chocolate treats.  It is a good cause cause the money raised helps the Red Cross, so it's a win win for all!

Cost: $15.00

Let's meetup at Richdale and walk over to the place that we can get the tickets.

UPDATE PARKING
There are 3 municipal lots downtown – as of May 9th Newburyport will be implementing meters in these parking lots.  The plan is that if there is a meter then you will have to pay to park in that spot, not sure if all 3 lots will have the parking meters in them but be aware of them.  The 3 lots are located at Green & Merrimac Streets, State and Harris Streets (next to the Library) and on Prince Place. There are 2 lots run by the Newburyport Redevelopment Authority They are located at either side of Waterfront Park along Merrimac Street Between The Black Cow and Not Your Average Joe’s (West Lot) and Water Street (East Lot). You may also park in legal spots on the street. If you park in a nearby neighborhood, please be respectful of residents and all parking laws - do not block fire hydrants or driveways. Police will ticket or tow all cars which are parked in illegal spaces.

We will only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.  

If you have not paid your dues for this year, be prepared to pay them at this event.  If you need to find out if you owe money, please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer”.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

Looking forward to seeing you!

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be outside of Richdale.
item.why: We LOVE chocolate and Newburyport is beautiful in the spring time!
item.name: Chocolate Tour in Newburyport
